LinkedInTips.Name: Setup Job Alerts
LinkedInTips.Explanation: Job alerts are used to notify you about new job openings.
Instructions: Search for a company you'd like to work for (Ex. nCino)
In the job title field type "Software Engineer"
For job location type "Wilmington, North Carolina"
When you're done click the blue job alert button.

LinkedInTips.Name: Set Viewing Options
LinkedInTips.Explanation: This will determine what people see when you view their profile. I'd recommend private mode.
Instructions: Select "Private mode" (or whatever mode you want people to see when you view their profile)
Click the back button once done.

LinkedInTips.Name: Setup Your Profile
LinkedInTips.Explanation: Set up your profile so recruiters can learn more about you and your work experience. Go to this (page)[/linkedin/SetUpProfile] for details.

LinkedInTips.Name: Setup Notification Settings
Instructions: Go to this LinkedIn page -> https://www.linkedin.com/mypreferences/d/categories/notifications. To set up your notification settings
I'd recommend having all notifications on for job alerts.

LinkedInTips.Name: Connect With People
Instructions: To connect with people simply look their name up in the search bar on the [feed page](https://www.linkedin.com/feed/).
Click their profile in the results.
Near the top of their profile click the blue "Connect" button.

LinkedInTips.Name: Try LinkedIn Premium for Free
LinkedInTips.Explanation: LinkedIn premium isn't worth the money in my opinion. However, LinkedIn does give you one month free, so I'd definitely recommend trying it out and coming to your own conclusions.
